text: Pietro Larizza (July 21, 1935 â€“ March 1, 2021) was an Italian politician and trade unionist. Larizza was born in Reggio Calabria, Italy. He was the general secretary of the Italian Labour Union (UIL) from February 1992 to 2000. Larizza was also a member of the Italian Senate from 2007 until 2008. Larizza died on March 1, 2021 at the age of 85.Morto Pietro Larizza, leader della Uil dal 1992 al 2000 ==References== ==Other websites== * Larizza' personal file from italian Senate * UIL official page Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Calabria Category:Italian trade unionists Category:People from Reggio Calabria
